thread.title: 10 extraordinary destinations you have probably never heard of
thread.title_full: 10 extraordinary destinations you have probably never heard of

author: Telegraph Staff
title: 10 extraordinary destinations you have probably never heard of
text:
MORE... 
If you want an extraordinary adventure, start by picking somewhere youâ€™ve never heard of... until now. 
When it comes to off-the beaten track, few people know their stuff more than Sophie Ibbotson and Max Lovell-Hoare , who wrote the Bradt guidebook to South Sudan the world's newest country (above, before it sadly fell into civil war). Here are 10 of the places they recommend visiting. 
Note that a couple of the destinations mentioned are subject to a Foreign Office advisory warning, which will affect travel insurance options (and should be cause for careful reflection before committing to a trip). 
-- 
By Sophie Ibbotson and Max Lovell-Hoare 
This article was first published on January 7, 2015 and updated on August 7, 2015. Picture: AFP
